column2: text
You’re lucky we don’t eat your face off
If it gets us back to the Dark Reservoir so be it
We'll not eat you… just yet.
Give us treasure or we eat you
You would be smart to accept this.
If you can see reason for a moment?
MMURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGH!
And they say trolls are stupid.
My patience wears thin… food.
You’re as thick as Gorgal if you think we’ll help you
Are you stupid? coming here!
Must we? You're looking tasty…
You've got one minute. Then it's meal time.
My guts got a good feeling about this
This is good. Tribe Ugma accepts.
I am Chief of all the Trolls, not King and you know which is more important, right?
I’m gonna make you an offer you can’t refuse.
This is better than a fish gut rub down.
Look I like you so here’s what I’m gonna do.
You smell like dung, lovely.
We’re eating now, maybe another time.
Nah not interested, maybe if you throw in some booty and fish guts?
We like you
Want us to smash someone’s head in?
Chief Ugma is happy to see you
My guts still iffy on this one
Hmm…. Fine.
We’ll add it to the rest of the sparkly stuff
This will make a nice throne for my arse.
We take stuff. No give back.
You’ve just saved yourself from a world of pain.
You’re not as thick as you look!
Excellent! Care for some leftovers?
Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice, watch it! I'm huge!
You think to dupe me?
Those who trick me rarely do so twice.
Deny me, are you blind to my power?
I think I need to smash some sense into your thick skull.
I had expected more from you.
It’s feeding time!
We will eat you, then your wives and save your plump children for desert!
I'll crush you personally!
I can no longer agree to this.
Fake deal, sad
Huh, we never had a deal
These fellas need a good thumping.
We'll smash them together!
Join in the simpler things!
Give stuff or we eat you.
Accept this and we’ll throw in all the fish guts you could ever want!
Don’t make me angry, you wouldn’t like me when I’m angry!
You could be useful to me…
Even the dullest Troll can see this is a bad offer.
And they call us ugly.
That stench isn’t us, it’s this rotten deal.
Together we are stronger.
More friends means more food for all!
For glory, spoils and food!
The tribe is full. Time to rest now.
I don’t remember us being at war, call it quits?
You call this war, this isn’t war, this is just a bit of rough housing
You need a hand? A club perhaps?
That looks fun. I want in!
Don't hog all the food for yourself!
This is but a fraction of what we hold at the Dark Reservoir
My treasure pile is overflowing. Have some.
We had some leftovers. Would you like them?
I am Chief Ugma. I lead these trolls.
Welcome. Ha HA! I never get tired of that surprised look.
We could eat you! but we won’t because you’re alright
My guts still empty!
You should have made war with that fairy Throgg!
I'm strong, you're weak. Figure it out.
And they call us stupid
I lead these trolls. Not you!
No, I think not.
I’m going to tear you limb from limb!
Time to smash and eat!
It's time to crush!
